summary: Completed substantial progress on Phase 2 of decidability procedure proofs. Reduced Saturation.lean sorries from 4 to 2 by proving all foldl-related helper lemmas (foldl_add_mono, foldl_filter_le, foldl_conditional_mono, foldl_conditional_ge_init) and completing the unexpanded_contributes theorem. Phases 3-4 (tableau_complete, decide_complete) remain blocked due to missing FMP-tableau connection infrastructure. Lake build succeeds with 7 documented sorries across Decidability modules.

artifacts.summary: Added 5 proven helper lemmas; unexpanded_contributes now fully proven; reduced from 4 to 2 sorries
Updated implementation summary with Session 4 progress and reduced sorry count
Updated Phase 2 status to COMPLETED with detailed notes on proven lemmas

next_steps: To complete remaining sorries: (1) Prove applyRule_decreases_complexity via case analysis on 16 tableau rules, (2) Complete expansion_decreases_measure final arithmetic, (3) For tableau_complete/decide_complete, consider proving intermediate FMP-tableau connection lemmas or accept existing validity_decidable_via_fmp as primary decidability result
